raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "orocos-kdl" %}
{% set version = "1.3.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  - url: https://github.com/orocos/orocos_kinematics_dynamics/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 987cdcf7c7e98db32668e8e5aa14067b5e16217a8ba44b18bfd10447a3f60af0
    patches:
      - orocos_kdl.patch
      - python_orocos_kdl.patch

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win and vc<14 or unix]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('orocos-kdl', max_pin='x.x') }}
    - {{ pin_subpackage('python-orocos-kdl', max_pin='x.x') }}

outputs:
  - name: orocos-kdl
    version: {{ version }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - pkg-config
      host:
        - eigen
      run:
        - eigen
    test:
      commands:
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\\lib\\orocos-kdl.lib exit 1  # [win]
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\\lib\\orocos-kdl.dll exit 1  # [win]
    script: bldpkg.bat
  - name: python-orocos-kdl
    version: {{ version }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - pkg-config
      host:
        - python
        - eigen
        - orocos-kdl
        - sip
      run:
        - python
        - eigen
        - orocos-kdl
        - sip
    test:
      imports:
        - PyKDL
    script: bldpkg.bat

about:
  home: https://github.com/orocos/orocos_kinematics_dynamics
  license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: orocos_kdl/COPYING
  summary: |
    Orocos Kinematics and Dynamics C++ library

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - seanyen
